```{r}

```
### Data

```{r}
earthquake %>%
  filter(yr==1995) %>%
  datatable()
```

### Terremotos mayores

```{r}
earthquake %>%
  filter(yr == 1995, mag >7.5) %>%
  leaflet()%>%
  addTiles()%>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, 
             lat = ~lat, 
             label = ~mag)
```

***

Se tiene que los terremotos mas fuertes han ocurrido en :
- Mexico
- Japon
- Chile
